body_html: Glad to see this go in. FYI there's also "adb install -r -g tensorflow_demo.apk" which will automatically grant permissions upon install (so you don't need to grant manually on every install). Unfortunately there's no way to do this currently directly through bazel, but they are working on it.

body: Glad to see this go in. FYI there's also "adb install -r -g tensorflow_demo.apk" which will automatically grant permissions upon install (so you don't need to grant manually on every install). Unfortunately there's no way to do this currently directly through bazel, but they are working on it.
